name: King Kaiju
description: Live the Dream! Be the Monster! Smash your way through a completely destructible virtual reality city. A simple and silly sandbox game for your inner Kaiju.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: 64 bit Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1 or Windows 10 Processor: Intel® i5-4590, AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 970, AMD Radeon™ R9 290 equivalent or better DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 200 MB available space Additional Notes: Requires Virtual Reality Headset and Controllers
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
